data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Baleshwar, Odisha, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Baleshwar, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Baleshwar, Odisha, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the county of Baleshwar a passion to plant another simple church.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Baleshwar, Odisha, India, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Brahmin Sakaldwipi people. Make the Brahmin Sakaldwipi people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Baleshwar, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Baleshwar, Odisha, India.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Baleshwar who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

location.name: Baleshwar
location.people_groups_list: Vanati, Gadaba, Begulu, Liari, Mukha Dhora
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Vanati (4,600), Gadaba (132,000), Begulu (300), Liari (200), Mukha Dhora (44,000)
